item.title: A pothole making my poor little car judder alot, 25th May
item.description:
As you go towards Lansdown rd before you get to the rail station roundabout and before the church on the right of the carriageway a deep pothole on the left hand side of the carriageway Sorry I didn’t get any other land marks. Thank you for your time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 208, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grangefield School Rd, 25th May
item.description:
Turning off Voxwell Rd into Grangefield school. The whole school road is very bad . With all the daily children pick up it’s getting worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grangefield Approach, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed hump triangles need repainting please, 25th May
item.description:
Speed hump triangles need repainting please, on ped crossing outside Berkhamstead school, Pittville. Towards Pittville Circus. The tree canopy adds to the shade obscuring the now unmarked speed hump (which is quite a high speed hump too !) - please don't unnecessarily cut down the tree foliage as we all need the oxygen !!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
